snippet: As the private equity bubble inflated during the first half of 2007, a period defined by record acquisitions by the world's largest buyout firms, the Federal Reserve took notice.
abstract: As the private equity bubble inflated during the first half of 2007, a period defined by record acquisitions by the world's largest buyout firms, the Federal Reserve took notice.

headline.main: Fed Transcripts Reveal Concerns About Private Equity Boom
